name: WaterDrip
0:
”Alexa, open water drip”
”Alexa, start water drip”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: water drip
des:
This skill will play a realistic water dripping sound, 

Some may use this for relaxation, others may use it for pranking a friend to make them think there's a water leak.

If you enjoy this skill please leave a review and find more funny skills by searching 'RP Apps' in the Alexa Skill store.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
